thread.title: Perfection in Paris
thread.title_full: Perfection in Paris - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 3Mokimon
title: Perfection in Paris
text: A lovely boutique hotel in a great location. I had a standard double and it was charming and very clean. This hotel is not cookie cutter and I loved the fun wallpaper. There is a metro station very close to the hotel and a taxi stand. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful. I had a street side room on the 6th floor and it was very quiet. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was big and with great water flow. I will stay here again next time I am in Paris.
